name: John Doe
likes: The van was spacious and clean. Loved the easy booking process!
improvement: Could have better instructions for navigation in rural areas.

name: Jane Smith
likes: Comfortable ride and great customer service.
improvement: The van could have been a bit more fuel efficient.

name: Sam Wilson
likes: The van was in good condition.
improvement: Could improve the heating system, it was a bit too cold at night.
